title: Yosemite National Park: Institutes & Field Schools
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Institutes & Field Schools                Institutes & Field Schools       If your class is visiting for multiple days, or if a Parks as Classrooms ranger program is not available, one of Yosemite's park partners may be able to meet your needs. These organizations can provide a wide range of single-day and multi-day experiences, with trained naturalists and educators.    NatureBridge Yosemite Conservancy  Yosemite Hospitality
